name: Monk and the Mountain of Lies
name_original: Monk and the Mountain of Lies
description:
Monk and the Mountain of Lies

Game made for Community Game Jam 2019 with Theme: "The Game Is A Liar"

Hey! Thanks for reading this.

I just want to let you know that it's my second game and first game jam, so don't except anything special :D
I made everything by myself including coding, art, sounds and music.
The only thing downloaded is the custom font: Which you can find here.
I hope I kept up with other participants!

Enjoy my game! :D

Game Instructions:

  • A and D or left and right arrows - left and right
  • Space - jump

PS I'm from Poland, so English is not my native language, so sorry of there are grammar or vocabulary mistakes.
